scripts.problema1: npm start hillClimbing problema1 ./input/problema1.txt && npm start hillClimbingRestart problema1 ./input/problema1.txt && npm start simulatedAnnealing problema1 ./input/problema1.txt && npm start ag problema1 ./input/problema1.txt
scripts.problema2: npm start hillClimbing problema2 ./input/problema2.txt && npm start hillClimbingRestart problema2 ./input/problema2.txt && npm start simulatedAnnealing problema2 ./input/problema2.txt && npm start ag problema2 ./input/problema2.txt
scripts.problema3: npm start hillClimbing problema3 ./input/38cities.txt && npm start hillClimbingRestart problema3 ./input/38cities.txt && npm start simulatedAnnealing problema3 ./input/38cities.txt && npm start ag problema3 ./input/38cities.txt
scripts.all: npm run problema1 && npm run problema2 && npm run problema3 && node report.mjs
